snippet: A growing number of Republican lawmakers are pressing Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to appoint an independent counsel to investigate the collapse of MF Global and the firm's misuse of customer money.
abstract: A growing number of Republican lawmakers are pressing Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to appoint an independent counsel to investigate the collapse of MF Global and the firm's misuse of customer money.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: Republicans Seek Independent Investigation of MF Global
